content: Jesus was crucified because the conspiracy between Herod Antipas and Illius Sejanus to overthrow the principiate of the Emperor Tiberius failed. Antipas was financing Jesus and his followers through his visir’s wife in order to put pressure on the Saducees, who controlled the Temple and it’s cult. Why do you think he wasn’t arrested immediately after (or during) his “cleansing of the Temple?” It all goes to the politics of the day, which is now literally ancient history.
